name: Youri Novikov
description: Product-oriented developer, I design, develop, and optimize digital solutions focused on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI). With over 2 years of experience in web development and 3 years in project management, I am proficient in the entire product lifecycle, from understanding business needs to delivery. I am used to collaborating in Agile environments with cross-functional and international teams, both on-site and remote.
